pkgmetadata.longdescription: This project contains a downstream version of the OpenJDK project. It is used to build and maintain a SAP supported version of OpenJDK for SAP customers and partners who wish to use OpenJDK to run their applications.

use.flag: Don't install the X backend for AWT, needed by some GUIs
Import OpenJFX modules at build time, via dev-java/openjfx
Build OpenJDK twice, the second time using the result of the first
